name: My Spy ♡
description:
Find the target and fall in love!  ♡

In My Spy, you are tasked from The Agency, to find targets using a dossier on your phone with limited information. However, you are are placed in a speed dating event to do so! Don't keep your phone up too long and annoy your dates, and make sure you pick the right target! 

Featuring two modes! Standard and Speed Dating!

In Standard, you tap on Start and go through each round, talking and asking your dates questions. Characters have "Annoyance" meters and when they fill up its Game Over! Make sure you listen to their answers carefully and don't pick the wrong one! 

In Speed Dating you have 1 minute and 30 seconds to go through all the dates in the game as fast as possible! Talking is short and the dossier is even shorter so go go go! Make sure you still pick the right date and aim for a high score!

♡ NEW CHRISTMAS DLC ♡

Its the holiday season and you must travel to the North Pole to find your newest targets! Find the spy in this winter wonderland and save the day! 

Note: This is the third level in the base game and features suggestive content. 

Our Spies
